item.title: blog2
item.description:
This is a test for a blog post
plot(mtcars) Now I am testing some α and β as well as some (Nardou et al. 2023) References .csl-entry{text-indent: -1.5em; margin-left: 1.5em;}Nardou, Romain, Edward Sawyer, Young Jun Song, Makenzie Wilkinson, Yasmin Padovan-Hernandez, Júnia Lara de Deus, Noelle Wright, et al. 2023. “Psychedelics Reopen the Social Reward Learning Critical Period.” Nature, June, 1–9. https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-023-06204-3.
